actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to purchase property located with the San Carlos Mineral Strip.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire through purchase from permitees or Apache Indian Tribe lessees having grazing rights within the so-called San Carlos Mineral Strip as of January 24,1969, any or all of their privately owned property, both real and personal, located within such area, taking title thereto in the name of the United States in trust for the San Carlos Apache Indian Tribe.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to purchase property located with the San Carlos Mineral Strip.
